bibl.title: Letter from H. Boyd Wylie to Philip Showalter Hench, December 9, 1952

div1.p: Wylie sends Hench a copy of the letter sent to him by Echeverria, indicating how much Echeverria enjoyed taking part in the Camp Lazear exercises.

div1.head: Letter from H. Boyd Wylie to Philip Showalter Hench, December 9, 1952
div1.opener:
UNIVERSITY OF MARYLAND
SCHOOL OF MEDICINE
BALTIMORE I. MARYLAND
December 9, 1952
OFFICE OF THE DEAN
Dr. Philip S. Hench
Mayo Clinic
Rochester, Minnesota
Dear Doctor Hench:
div1.p:
This is in acknowledgment of your pleasant letter of
November 28, 1952 in connection with our Doctor Echeverria.

I thought you would like to have a copy of the letter
sent to me by Dr. Echeverria to let you see how much he enjoyed
taking part in the exercises.

Kindest regards and best wishes for a pleasant
holiday.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, H. Boyd Wylie, M. D.
Dean HBW:vs
Enc. - 1
